00010 /*----------------------- Type definitions ---------------------------*/
00011 
00012 typedef  enum { NOTFOUND=0, TSFILE=1, CBFILE=2, PAFILE=3 } CBFILETYPE;
00013 typedef  enum { EUCLIDEANSQ=0, ENTROPYDIST=1,
00014                 JACCARD=11, DICE=12 } DISTANCETYPE;
00015 typedef  enum { MSE=0, SC=1, JACCARDERROR=11, DICEERROR=12,
00016                                 DBI=2 } ERRORFTYPE;
00017 #define  FormatNameCB    "cb"
00018 #define  FormatNameTS    "ts"
00019 #define  FormatNamePA    "pa"
00020 #define  FormatName(ft)  ((ft)==TSFILE ? FormatNameTS : \
00021                          ((ft)==CBFILE ? FormatNameCB : \
00022                          ((ft)==PAFILE ? FormatNamePA : "")))

00024 /*---------------------  Vector definitions  -------------------------*/
00025 
00026 typedef     int                  VECTORELEMENT;
00027 typedef     VECTORELEMENT*       VECTORTYPE;
00028 typedef     struct { VECTORTYPE  vector;
00029                      VECTORELEMENT vmean;
00030                      int         freq;
00031                      char*       name;
00032                    } BOOKNODE;
00033 typedef     BOOKNODE*            BOOKTYPE;
00034 
00035 /*---------------------  Counter definition  -------------------------*/
00036 
00037 typedef     struct { llong*      counter;
00038                      int         freq;
00039                    } COUNTER;

00041 /*---------------------  Codebook data structure  --------------------*/
00042 
00043 #define     MaxVersionLength     80
00044 #define     MaxGenMethodLength   80
00045 #define     MaxVectorNameLength  80
00046 typedef     struct { char        Versionstr[MaxVersionLength];
00047                      int         BlockSizeX;
00048                      int         BlockSizeY;
00049                      int         CodebookSize;
00050                      int         TotalFreq;
00051                      int         BytesPerElement;
00052                      int         MinValue;
00053                      int         MaxValue;
00054                      int         Preprocessing;
00055                      char        GenerationMethod[MaxGenMethodLength];
00056                      BOOKTYPE    Book;
00057                      int         AllocatedSize;
00058                    } CODEBOOK;
00059 
00060 /*---------------------  Training set structure  ---------------------*/
00061 
00062 #define    TRAININGSET  CODEBOOK
00063 
00064 /*-------------------  Partitioning data structure  ------------------*/
00065 
00066 typedef struct { char     Versionstr[MaxVersionLength];
00067                  int      PartitionCount; /* Number of partitions. */
00068                  int      TSsize;         /* Number of items to map. */
00069                  int*     Map;            /* Cursors from TS to CB. */
00070                  int*     First;   /* Cursor to first element in partition. */
00071                  int*     Next;           /* Next item in partition. */
00072                  COUNTER* CC;             /* Centroid counters */
00073                  int*     Uniques;        /* Number of unique vectors in p */
00074                  int      Vsize;          /* Vector size (dimension) */
00075                  char     GenerationMethod[MaxGenMethodLength];
00076                  int      AllocatedSize;
00077                } PARTITIONING;
00078 
00079 #define ENDPARTITION      -1
00080 
00081 /*-------------------  Graph data structure  -------------------------*/
00082 
00083 typedef struct GraphVector { int index;     // Vector index in vectors -table
00084                              int *data;     // Vector components
00085                              int *kindices; //table of edges as vertex indexes 
00086 } GraphVector;
00087 
00088 typedef struct { int nvec;    // Number of vectors
00089                  int k;              
00090                  int dim;     // Vector dimensionality
00091                  int maxcoord;
00092                  int mincoord;
00093                  GraphVector **vectors;  // Table of vector pointers
00094 } Graph;
